name: 12 Week Year on Notion
description: Achieving goals is all about baby steps.This template uses the 12 Week Plan approach by Biran Moran.1. Crystallise your vision2. Develop a 12-Week Plan3. Keep a score & continually improve4. Regain control of your time with DO, Defer, Delegate or Delete5.
